LABEL: 0x3C3
STRING: 「Now――」

LABEL: 0x3DD
STRING: 「Let's not lose our energy.」

LABEL: 0x417
STRING: 「Our time limit is approaching.」

LABEL: 0x452
STRING: Yukari raised her voice again, encouraging everyone.

LABEL: 0x482
STRING: Her voice made the air feel clear, as if one had just woken up.

LABEL: 0x4DE
STRING: That's right―nothing was over yet.

LABEL: 0x510
STRING: Hikari had been sent to the surface, and now everything began.

LABEL: 0x53E
STRING: We'd already finished everything we needed to do.

LABEL: 0x568
STRING: All that was left was for us to escape ourselves.

LABEL: 0x620
STRING: 「Let us escape as well.」

LABEL: 0x64E
STRING: 「My promise―I have to keep it.」

LABEL: 0x689
STRING: Tokiwa stood up with renewed determination.

LABEL: 0x6B5
STRING: I couldn't ignore those feelings of hers.

LABEL: 0x705
STRING: We would definitely succeed.

LABEL: 0x727
STRING: We would definitely get out of here.

LABEL: 0x81A
STRING: 「That said, all the preparations are complete.」

LABEL: 0x84E
STRING: 「All we have to do now is activate the detonator.」

LABEL: 0x898
STRING: 「We need to secure our bodies in a safe place because of the impact, but――」

LABEL: 0x920
STRING: Touri looked somewhat glum.

LABEL: 0x94A
STRING: Reiri saw her and called out to her in a tedious tone.

LABEL: 0xA00
STRING: 「Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0xA18
STRING: 「What's bothering you?」

LABEL: 0xA46
STRING: 「It's time for us to leave this ship...」

LABEL: 0xA86
STRING: 「What are you worrying about now that we've come this far?」

LABEL: 0xB56
STRING: 「Is it... okay for us to survive?」

LABEL: 0xB95
STRING: Touri trembled slightly as she spoke.

LABEL: 0xBCD
STRING: She looked like she was terrified.

LABEL: 0xC45
STRING: What she was looking at was――

LABEL: 0xC69
STRING: Touri's eyes were looking in the other direction.

LABEL: 0xC9B
STRING: At the end of her line of sight was the bridge, and further beyond that, the rear section.

LABEL: 0xCE3
STRING: There lay the many dead, still drifting without rest.

LABEL: 0xD29
STRING: That was what frightened her.

LABEL: 0xDBF
STRING: 「There were so many people at the launch ceremony, and most of them boarded this ship...」

LABEL: 0xE1D
STRING: 「All those people who were on the observation deck back then should still be there.」

LABEL: 0xE6B
STRING: 「And yet... why?」

LABEL: 0xE95
STRING: 「Why are we the only ones saved?」

LABEL: 0xEF9
STRING: Why were we the only ones?

LABEL: 0xF21
STRING: Yukari's shoulders trembled as she listened to Touri's confession.

LABEL: 0xFD0
STRING: Looking back at her memories from seven years ago――

LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: As a result of an accident that had occurred on the deep-sea exploration ship <SHEEP>,

LABEL: 0x1039
STRING: she was the only one among its three members to "survive." Her anguish must be similar to Touri's.

LABEL: 0x10A5
STRING: Why me?

LABEL: 0x10C3
STRING: If it wasn't me, then maybe...

LABEL: 0x10F1
STRING: If it wasn't for me, then...

LABEL: 0x1113
STRING: Countless questions rose up one after another and constricted your heart even if you knew it was futile.

LABEL: 0x118A
STRING: 「Honestly...」

LABEL: 0x11A8
STRING: 「That's all nonsense.」

LABEL: 0x12BB
STRING: Reiri chuckled, then looked up and opened her eyes wide.

LABEL: 0x1301
STRING: What I saw in her wide-open eyes was not madness.

LABEL: 0x133B
STRING: It was her reasoning.

LABEL: 0x1361
STRING: That our troubles were "nonsense."

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: 「What a stupid thing to say, Touri... And――」

LABEL: 0x1449
STRING: 「――Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: Yes. I'd also made a choice.

LABEL: 0x1496
STRING: And I was certain that I had made a mistake.

LABEL: 0x14BE
STRING: After taking 50 lives, I'd return to the surface as if nothing had happened.

LABEL: 0x150C
STRING: Could I truly be forgiven?

LABEL: 0x1554
STRING: 「If I could do it all over, I would.」

LABEL: 0x1584
STRING: 「That's what I think.」

LABEL: 0x15BB
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x15DE
STRING: 「It's just useless drivel, I know.」

LABEL: 0x1614
STRING: 「Even so, I have no choice but to think about it...」

LABEL: 0x165A
STRING: 「How and why things ended up this way.」

LABEL: 0x168C
STRING: ――That was the answer I arrived at.

LABEL: 0x16AE
STRING: We'd all survive... The choice should have been for that reason.

LABEL: 0x16EE
STRING: But at the end of it all, only those here and Hikari would survive――

LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: The people who had died when we sank were gone, never to return.

LABEL: 0x1778
STRING: I should have forgotten about my sister from the start.

LABEL: 0x17C8
STRING: Since that day seven years ago, everything had been wrong, hadn't it...?

LABEL: 0x187E
STRING: 「Living―in other words, survival―is a race in itself.」

LABEL: 0x18BC
STRING: 「Everyone keeps running. If you don't run, you'll be left behind.」

LABEL: 0x195D
STRING: 「It's the famous Red Queen hypothesis.」

LABEL: 0x198C
STRING: The harsh reality Reiri acknowledged.

LABEL: 0x19B2
STRING: Should we take the words of this girl who had lived her life by increasing her value,

LABEL: 0x1A00
STRING: and winning through knowledge as the childishness of a high school student, or――

LABEL: 0x1AA2
STRING: 「"It takes all the running you can do to stay in the same place."」

LABEL: 0x1AF7
STRING: 「All living things expend energy just to stay in place.」

LABEL: 0x1B51
STRING: 「The cost of maintaining the current situation is infinite if you aim for an infinite amount of time.」

LABEL: 0x1BA3
STRING: 「And on a battlefield like that... we survived.」

LABEL: 0x1BDF
STRING: 「If surviving and winning isn't enough, then we should've obediently waved the white flag right there and then.」

LABEL: 0x1C4E
STRING: But... we didn't.

LABEL: 0x1C82
STRING: This was the answer we desperately sought, searched for, and chose to survive for.

LABEL: 0x1CD6
STRING: The place we arrived at――

LABEL: 0x1D07
STRING: 「You fought to survive, and you won. So, what is there to worry about?」

LABEL: 0x1D59
STRING: 「Why don't you just enjoy the future you've chosen?」

LABEL: 0x1D9A
STRING: 「But... that's not what I wanted.」

LABEL: 0x1DD6
STRING: 「Touri, Reiri, Tokiwa, Yukari-san, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x1E2A
STRING: 「I had no choice but to live so that everyone else could survive――」

LABEL: 0x1E60
STRING: Live, and survive.

LABEL: 0x1E8A
STRING: Return everyone to the surface.

LABEL: 0x1EAC
STRING: As long as I could do that, I was satisfied.

LABEL: 0x1EDE
STRING: There was no need for me to survive and return to with them.

LABEL: 0x1F88
STRING: 「Katagiri... do you even know what the hell you're talking about?」

LABEL: 0x1FDD
STRING: Was it exasperation or anger that seeped into Reiri's words?

LABEL: 0x2041
STRING: She walked up to me, shaking.

LABEL: 0x20D7
STRING: 「Wishing you wouldn't survive――」

LABEL: 0x210D
STRING: 「Are you joking?」

LABEL: 0x21C8
STRING: 「I see. I get it.」

LABEL: 0x21EF
STRING: At my inability to answer, Reiri gave me a sad look.

LABEL: 0x222B
STRING: And, began to speak.

LABEL: 0x22BD
STRING: 「Let me tell you a story from the past.」

LABEL: 0x22DB
STRING: 「...I survived by killing my mother.」

LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: Reiri's voice suddenly lowered.

LABEL: 0x2356
STRING: She killed her own mother...?

LABEL: 0x2376
STRING: According to what I'd heard earlier, Touri and Reiri's mother was caught up in the Aqualine accident――

LABEL: 0x23C8
STRING: Reiri nodded as I stared in wonder.

LABEL: 0x246C
STRING: 「The truth is, my mother should've survived.」

LABEL: 0x24A6
STRING: 「Even though she was in a critical condition and given the red rating, she was in a better state than me, who was on the verge of death.」

LABEL: 0x250A
STRING: 「She would've survived if she'd been given the appropriate treatment.」

LABEL: 0x25B1
STRING: 「Despite that, I was the one who was saved.」

LABEL: 0x25E7
STRING: 「If they didn't devote so many resources to patients that needed rehabilitation even after surviving,

LABEL: 0x2643
STRING: they could've saved several other people, not just my mother――」

LABEL: 0x268D
STRING: 「How many lives were sacrificed for me to survive?」

LABEL: 0x26DE
STRING: 「That's not it!!」

LABEL: 0x26FD
STRING: Touri shouted as if she couldn't take it anymore.

LABEL: 0x2727
STRING: Her face was pale as she stared at Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2763
STRING: Perhaps her sister was the only thing she could see.

LABEL: 0x2868
STRING: 「You're wrong... Don't say that, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x28FB
STRING: 「It was right that you survived... It was right, so...」

LABEL: 0x296E
STRING: 「Yes... You're right, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x29F7
STRING: 「I'm sorry for putting it that way, so don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x2A40
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x2A5F
STRING: Reiri tried to soothe her sister.

LABEL: 0x2A7F
STRING: She reached out her hand toward Touri, who she normally found to be a nuisance, and patted her on the head.

LABEL: 0x2AE5
STRING: The scene was like... a mother loving her daughter.

LABEL: 0x2B8D
STRING: 「You're not wrong.」

LABEL: 0x2C12
STRING: 「That's why... I have to grasp the future.」

LABEL: 0x2CE3
STRING: ――Yes.

LABEL: 0x2CFD
STRING: I now understood everything.

LABEL: 0x2D23
STRING: Why had Reiri reached for the archive of the universe that <COOS> possessed?

LABEL: 0x2D71
STRING: Why did she have to take her knowledge to even greater heights,

LABEL: 0x2DAF
STRING: even after reaching a level unheard of considering she was still a high school student?

LABEL: 0x2DF7
STRING: She――

LABEL: 0x2E0F
STRING: Because she, too, had "survived"――

LABEL: 0x2F9A
STRING: 「Do you understand, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x2FBE
STRING: 「We survived.」

LABEL: 0x2FEE
STRING: 「And now that we've survived, we have to live.」

LABEL: 0x303C
STRING: 「I can't deny that you're unwilling to think, act,

LABEL: 0x308C
STRING: and choose the present and future ahead of you.」

LABEL: 0x30F2
STRING: 「Because, it could come to an end at any point.」

LABEL: 0x312E
STRING: 「You should've been able to die, or maybe even run away.」

LABEL: 0x3178
STRING: 「However――」

LABEL: 0x3199
STRING: It's just as Reiri said.

LABEL: 0x31BB
STRING: I didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x31DD
STRING: I kept choosing until the end.

LABEL: 0x31FF
STRING: A path to keep everyone alive, and to keep myself alive――

LABEL: 0x3237
STRING: That was the present I chose and grasped.

LABEL: 0x3269
STRING: We couldn't deny what we'd grasped, even if we had closed off the possibilities that should've been there.

LABEL: 0x32BD
STRING: 「The present I've reached.」

LABEL: 0x334D
STRING: 「Yes... That's how we've lived our lives, seizing the present and the future.」

LABEL: 0x339D
STRING: 「It would be stupid to deny and halt that progress because of petty sentimentality.」

LABEL: 0x33FC
STRING: With that, Reiri turned from Touri and faced me.

LABEL: 0x34CA
STRING: 「So, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x34EA
STRING: 「We survived. This world was for the best.」

LABEL: 0x352C
STRING: 「There's no need to worry about obtaining the best answer. That's the natural order of things.」

LABEL: 0x3586
STRING: 「So, let's return. Back to the surface――」

LABEL: 0x35C1
STRING: 「Please wait.」

LABEL: 0x3600
STRING: Suddenly, a hand was raised straight up in the air.

LABEL: 0x362E
STRING: The sleeves of her kimono slid down, revealing her white upper arm.

LABEL: 0x3670
STRING: Saihouji Tokiwa stood in front of me.

LABEL: 0x3775
STRING: 「Reiri-san, I understand what you're trying to say,

LABEL: 0x37B7
STRING: but I don't think it's a good idea to twist the "natural order of things."」

LABEL: 0x382D
STRING: Reiri didn't respond to Tokiwa's straightforward gaze.

LABEL: 0x3865
STRING: Survival was victory, and the winner was good.

LABEL: 0x38A9
STRING: She said that it was natural, but Tokiwa denied it.

LABEL: 0x3908
STRING: 「Natural selection――」

LABEL: 0x394B
STRING: 「Selection and choice are just two sides of the same coin.」

LABEL: 0x398E
STRING: 「In Darwin's theory of evolution, it's pure providence, free of value judgments.」

LABEL: 0x39F3
STRING: In other words, the good didn't survive, and the bad didn't get exterminated.

LABEL: 0x3A47
STRING: What survived was not good; what died out was not bad.

LABEL: 0x3B10
STRING: 「What are you trying to say?」

LABEL: 0x3B36
STRING: 「Do you think we could've done more?」

LABEL: 0x3B66
STRING: 「Or, are you trying to tell me that we were hopelessly wrong from the start?」

LABEL: 0x3C2E
STRING: 「No, not at all.」

LABEL: 0x3C5F
STRING: If the future we grasped was not the best, then what was?

LABEL: 0x3CAB
STRING: What should I have done...?

LABEL: 0x3CF6
STRING: 「In the first place, natural selection was an essential concept of evolutionary theory,

LABEL: 0x3D3C
STRING: but its meaning is often greatly misunderstood―even up to present day.」

LABEL: 0x3D8A
STRING: 「It's like what Reiri-san said earlier――」

LABEL: 0x3DC6
STRING: 「The most typical example is that the best and the brightest surviving is "natural."」

LABEL: 0x3E14
STRING: 「In other words, that evolution is progress.」

LABEL: 0x3E5F
STRING: Evolution was progress――

LABEL: 0x3E81
STRING: The implication was that in each generation, "good things" survived,

LABEL: 0x3ECB
STRING: and one generation after another, they evolved into better species.

LABEL: 0x3F1B
STRING: But... in the end, that was a mistake.

LABEL: 0x3F4D
STRING: Tokiwa hummed in agreement with her own words and continued.

LABEL: 0x3FF9
STRING: 「That... seems consistent in a way.」

LABEL: 0x4035
STRING: 「There are fruits that grow on tall trees, and the long-necked giraffe, that was better suited to eating them, survived――」

LABEL: 0x4095
STRING: 「That's why giraffes have long necks.」

LABEL: 0x40BF
STRING: 「In other words, the giraffe's neck grew for the purpose of eating the fruit.」

LABEL: 0x4125
STRING: 「That may seem like a reasonable and understandable explanation.」

LABEL: 0x4181
STRING: 「However... it's not the truth.」

LABEL: 0x41B4
STRING: Tokiwa spoke quietly and slowly.

LABEL: 0x41E0
STRING: That was the foundation of the theory of evolution――

LABEL: 0x4204
STRING: To "evolve" was not equal to "moving in a better direction."

LABEL: 0x4263
STRING: 「Darwin's theory of evolution discarded such a teleological interpretation.」

LABEL: 0x42B7
STRING: 「He denied that evolution was toward a purpose, to become better.」

LABEL: 0x430A
STRING: "For example," she said.

LABEL: 0x433D
STRING: 「Living creatures acquired "eyes" during their evolution.」

LABEL: 0x4377
STRING: 「Living creatures with "eyes" had the advantage in the struggle for survival.」

LABEL: 0x43B7
STRING: 「Eventually, those "eyes" created competition between predator and prey.」

LABEL: 0x4401
STRING: 「It was an important trait that accelerated the diversity of living beings in one go.」

LABEL: 0x4456
STRING: The so-called Cambrian explosion.

LABEL: 0x4480
STRING: I once read in a textbook that it was the birth of "eyes" that triggered it.

LABEL: 0x44F1
STRING: 「But look at these creatures in the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x4531
STRING: 「As time went by, creatures dived into the deep sea, and the "eyes" they had acquired quickly degenerated.」

LABEL: 0x4589
STRING: 「In the deep sea, maintaining unused "eyes" is costly.」

LABEL: 0x45D7
STRING: 「But there's one thing we mustn't forget at this time.」

LABEL: 0x4615
STRING: 「They didn't decide that they didn't need their "eyes" on their own.」

LABEL: 0x466F
STRING: 「It's just that in the deep sea, the creatures who used fewer resources to maintain their "eyes" survived to the next generation.」

LABEL: 0x46D9
STRING: 「It was just a coincidence.」

LABEL: 0x46FF
STRING: 「Hypothetically, if the deep sea were not dark at the time...」

LABEL: 0x4745
STRING: 「If something like <COOS> appeared at the bottom of the sea, shining brightly...」

LABEL: 0x478D
STRING: 「At that time, the creatures with "eyes" would've survived and gained the upper hand.」

LABEL: 0x47F0
STRING: The definition of "good" changed depending on time and space.

LABEL: 0x482A
STRING: What was right at this moment might turn out to be wrong in the next.

LABEL: 0x488D
STRING: 「There was no intention there, no value judgment.」

LABEL: 0x48CB
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if it's the future or the past. It's just that, in that moment, the choice is made.」

LABEL: 0x4911
STRING: 「We keep on being chosen.」

LABEL: 0x4933
STRING: 「We're living here today as a result of countless unseen and repeated "best" choices for their time.」

LABEL: 0x499F
STRING: 「That's all there is to it.」

LABEL: 0x49CC
STRING: 「That's all――」

LABEL: 0x49F0
STRING: Not chosen because of an intent.

LABEL: 0x4A96
STRING: 「That's why, Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x4ABC
STRING: 「Even if this present isn't what you want...」

LABEL: 0x4B02
STRING: 「You're saying that you can't start over.」

LABEL: 0x4B4B
STRING: That was obvious.

LABEL: 0x4B77
STRING: Wanting to rewind time and start over was just a metaphor.

LABEL: 0x4BBD
STRING: 「I know. But no matter what, it won't disappear.」

LABEL: 0x4BFF
STRING: 「If I had done that then, no, if I hadn't done that,

LABEL: 0x4C4B
STRING: or if I could go back as far as I could, I would've tried to grab hold of it.」

LABEL: 0x4C91
STRING: 「The choice to make the best possible "present"――」

LABEL: 0x4CD6
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4D0A
STRING: 「Listen carefully.」

LABEL: 0x4D33
STRING: Tokiwa walked over to me.

LABEL: 0x4D5B
STRING: I could see myself reflected in her clear eyes.

LABEL: 0x4DF1
STRING: 「It's only when we know the future that we can form causality.」

LABEL: 0x4E3D
STRING: 「But that cause and effect,

LABEL: 0x4E5F
STRING: that causality... is false.」

LABEL: 0x4E90
STRING: 「...Then the only thing we can do in the present is――」

LABEL: 0x4ED2
STRING: Tokiwa quietly stated her answer.

LABEL: 0x4F72
STRING: 「At those times, choose the path you believe is good.」

LABEL: 0x4FB0
STRING: 「And, accept the consequences.」

LABEL: 0x4FED
STRING: Her answer was extremely simple.

LABEL: 0x501F
STRING: 「Accept it――」

LABEL: 0x50AB
STRING: 「Everything you've done up until now and everything you will do going forward.」

LABEL: 0x50F3
STRING: 「Was the choice you faced really a choice?」

LABEL: 0x516D
STRING: 「You may be able to answer the question once it's posed.」

LABEL: 0x51B1
STRING: 「However, it's meaningless to interpret afterward whether one was right or wrong on the path they walked,

LABEL: 0x51F7
STRING: seeking answers before being asked the question.」

LABEL: 0x5273
STRING: 「You mustn't ignore the past by denying your steps in that moment.」

LABEL: 0x52CD
STRING: 「It's a mistake to think that we can grasp the best future simply because we made the best choices at the time,

LABEL: 0x5319
STRING: denying the past we accumulated to reach out to an unseen future.」

LABEL: 0x5389
STRING: 「If this is the path you chose with pride...」

LABEL: 0x53C1
STRING: 「No matter the outcome, you should be proud and accept it.」

LABEL: 0x5402
STRING: What didn't happen couldn't exist in the first place.

LABEL: 0x5444
STRING: One choice didn't determine the future, but at the end of your accumulated choices lay the present.

LABEL: 0x54FE
STRING: 「Reiri-san called <COOS> an archive of the universe, but...」

LABEL: 0x5552
STRING: 「We ourselves are the archive of 4.6 billion years, living in the present after the accumulation of the past.」

LABEL: 0x55B2
STRING: 「We are the result of 4.6 billion years of repeated choices and selections.」

LABEL: 0x5617
STRING: 「Are you saying there's no point in having regrets?」

LABEL: 0x565A
STRING: 「I wouldn't say it's pointless. On an individual level, it will lead to good reflection and feedback.」

LABEL: 0x56CC
STRING: 「But the idea that the present result is wrong or that we should change it is endlessly futile.」

LABEL: 0x5730
STRING: 「This place that we've been led to, even if we did not choose it...」

LABEL: 0x57D3
STRING: 「...All we can do is accept it.」

LABEL: 0x5838
STRING: Accept it all and keep living.

LABEL: 0x5866
STRING: Tokiwa said that the past accumulated here and now was neither right nor wrong, but just there.

LABEL: 0x58C2
STRING: Or, as Reiri had put it, the present we had won.

LABEL: 0x59C5
STRING: 「Either way, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x59EB
STRING: 「You'll be the one to choose.」

LABEL: 0x5A0B
STRING: 「As it always has been, and will be from now on――」

LABEL: 0x5A47
STRING: 「You will continue to choose.」

LABEL: 0x5B46
STRING: Another crashing sound echoed from outside the ship.

LABEL: 0x5B8B
STRING: 「――We're running out of time, everyone.」

LABEL: 0x5BC0
STRING: What was going on outside the ship, and what was going on the surface?

LABEL: 0x5C02
STRING: I didn't know the details, but... I didn't think there was much time left.

LABEL: 0x5C44
STRING: 「Touri... Have you made up your mind to escape?」

LABEL: 0x5CE2
STRING: 「Yeah... I get it now.」

LABEL: 0x5D08
STRING: 「For the sake of the people who died, and for the future...」

LABEL: 0x5DA9
STRING: 「We'll absolutely make it out of here alive!」

LABEL: 0x5DF2
STRING: No longer were there any concerns.

LABEL: 0x5E12
STRING: And, there was no time.

LABEL: 0x5E34
STRING: Everyone's wills were united.

LABEL: 0x5E58
STRING: 「Let's escape from here―all of us.」

LABEL: 0x60F6
STRING: Our journey to the surface would follow the ozone explosion.

LABEL: 0x612A
STRING: It was easy to imagine that the <SHEEP III>, once separated from the rear section and almost spherical in shape,

LABEL: 0x6171
STRING: could easily spin around and around depending on the force applied.

LABEL: 0x61C9
STRING: The shock of the accident on the first day was significant, but this time it was different.

LABEL: 0x6215
STRING: There wouldn't be just shaking.

LABEL: 0x623F
STRING: First, we had to find an empty area.

LABEL: 0x6304
STRING: ――As a result, the theater room was chosen.

LABEL: 0x633E
STRING: Fixed seats, as if gazing at the ceiling in the shape of a sphere.

LABEL: 0x637A
STRING: Each person strapped themselves into a seat that had only a loose seatbelt as a safety device.

LABEL: 0x63E9
STRING: 「This is kind of a strange feeling.」

LABEL: 0x6417
STRING: 「It's like we're all at the movies together.」

LABEL: 0x644D
STRING: 「It's strange, but I'm starting to get excited.」

LABEL: 0x648C
STRING: Touri smiled cheerfully as if she had completely gotten over herself.

LABEL: 0x64C6
STRING: It seemed mismatched considering what was about to happen, but...

LABEL: 0x6508
STRING: ――There was no point worrying about it anymore.

LABEL: 0x6540
STRING: Getting desperate was no good, so that level of ease was probably just right.

LABEL: 0x6590
STRING: 「Maybe more like a roller coaster than a movie theater.」

LABEL: 0x65CC
STRING: 「No, a cutting-edge scream machine made by ROMLES, the like of which has never been seen before.」

LABEL: 0x660E
STRING: 「Our emotions at the finish line... I can't even imagine it.」

LABEL: 0x6642
STRING: In front of us was a temporary night sky.

LABEL: 0x6668
STRING: Countless stars―each and every one of them glowing as if guiding us.

LABEL: 0x66C0
STRING: Each of them illuminated us as countless possibilities.

LABEL: 0x6763
STRING: Even if their light was false...

LABEL: 0x678B
STRING: As long as they guided us to the place we needed to go, it was fine.

LABEL: 0x67E4
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6808
STRING: 「Don't say anything weird about the <SHEEP III> or ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x684E
STRING: 「S-Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x68C7
STRING: I was just joking around...

LABEL: 0x68ED
STRING: However, Yukari's reprimanding tone was more theatrical than genuinely angry.

LABEL: 0x694F
STRING: When I apologized, she gave a small chuckle.

LABEL: 0x6992
STRING: 「Have you ever been to Aquamarine Park?」

LABEL: 0x69D9
STRING: 「Nee-san took me there a few times...」

LABEL: 0x6A16
STRING: 「I'm sure you're aware,

LABEL: 0x6A64
STRING: but ROMLES' attractions have pretty bizarre names.」

LABEL: 0x6A9F
STRING: 「...Indeed.」

LABEL: 0x6ACA
STRING: 「That said, that unique sense of style was controversial even within ROMLES...」

LABEL: 0x6B1D
STRING: Yukari smiled bitterly as she remembered.

LABEL: 0x6B43
STRING: I remembered some of them too... but I don't think there were any "Water Wars - Barreleye's Awakening" or anything like that.

LABEL: 0x6BAF
STRING: According to the rumors I'd heard when I went in and out of ROMLES,

LABEL: 0x6BE9
STRING: one of the higher-ups was responsible for the naming process.

LABEL: 0x6C43
STRING: No matter how you spun it, there was no doubt that they should be dismissed immediately.

LABEL: 0x6C8E
STRING: 「Everyone, have you secured your bodies properly?」

LABEL: 0x6CCC
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, what's the ozone concentration?」

LABEL: 0x6D09
STRING: 「33vol%%―it's enough.」

LABEL: 0x6D2D
STRING: 「Wait for me... Rumi-chan.」

LABEL: 0x6D57
STRING: 「I'm sure we'll be there soon.」

LABEL: 0x6D8A
STRING: Tokiwa closed her eyes.

LABEL: 0x6DB4
STRING: She took a deep breath

LABEL: 0x6DEC
STRING: and opened her eyes wide.

LABEL: 0x6E80
STRING: 「Ah, could this be my honeymoon with Sousuke-san?!」

LABEL: 0x6F25
STRING: 「I'm not an expert in geography, but I'd like our first stop to be the surface!」

LABEL: 0x6F8C
STRING: 「You heard her, Sousuke-san.」

LABEL: 0x6FC1
STRING: 「...Do I have to respond?」

LABEL: 0x7004
STRING: Hiragino let out a tired voice.

LABEL: 0x7036
STRING: He was a pitiful man to the very end.

LABEL: 0x7066
STRING: Tokiwa laughed jokingly at the situation.

LABEL: 0x70A7
STRING: 「I was just joking, of course.」

LABEL: 0x70CD
STRING: 「Once we get to the surface safely, I'll have you take me to a better location.」

LABEL: 0x711D
STRING: 「Like a yakiniku restaurant.」

LABEL: 0x714C
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x7177
STRING: 「Like I said, I'm just kidding.」

LABEL: 0x71A2
STRING: Which part was the joke?

LABEL: 0x71C8
STRING: She was smart, childish, optimistic, and genuine.

LABEL: 0x7204
STRING: Tokiwa's behavior left others at her mercy.

LABEL: 0x723A
STRING: From somewhere, I could hear a coughing laugh.

LABEL: 0x728B
STRING: 「Doctor, don't let your stress get the better of you.」

LABEL: 0x72C6
STRING: 「...Just worry about your own weak body. Don't die of shock.」

LABEL: 0x7323
STRING: 「Well, that's not my domain.」

LABEL: 0x7357
STRING: 「If anything happens, it'll be all over.」

LABEL: 0x738E
STRING: 「If anything happens, I'll take care of it. Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x73D7
STRING: 「How reliable.」

LABEL: 0x7404
STRING: 「I'm a doctor, after all.」

LABEL: 0x7433
STRING: 「Hmm‾」

LABEL: 0x7450
STRING: Hiragino didn't like to be called or call himself a doctor.

LABEL: 0x7494
STRING: Hearing his declaration, Reiri seemed somehow satisfied.

LABEL: 0x74D0
STRING: Even if she threw around hateful words, she wasn't a bad guy...

LABEL: 0x750E
STRING: If you got used to her sharp tongue, it was kind of endearing. Like a child who couldn't be honest with herself.

LABEL: 0x7577
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x7593
STRING: 「What are you grinning about? It's disgusting.」

LABEL: 0x75C1
STRING: 「Do you want to go activate the detonator manually?」

LABEL: 0x7629
STRING: 「Just kidding.」

LABEL: 0x7648
STRING: 「――Then say it like one!」

LABEL: 0x7687
STRING: 「I'm not good at making jokes.」

LABEL: 0x76AE
STRING: Saying that, Reiri turned her face away.

LABEL: 0x76D8
STRING: As usual, there was a veil of offensive remarks surrounding her. She was a girl who couldn't reveal her true feelings.

LABEL: 0x7720
STRING: Maybe that just now was some of her honest thoughts she'd let slip.

LABEL: 0x77D8
STRING: 「POL, what time is it?」

LABEL: 0x7843
STRING: It would be the middle of the night on the surface.

LABEL: 0x7877
STRING: 【In addition, sunrise today is at 04:51 AM, bearing 68.1°E.】

LABEL: 0x78B5
STRING: An hour until sunrise――

LABEL: 0x7937
STRING: 「Tokiwa, do you know how long it takes to get to the surface?」

LABEL: 0x79AE
STRING: 「...Ten minutes at most!」

LABEL: 0x79E4
STRING: 「By the time we get there, we'll probably be able to see the real night sky.」

LABEL: 0x7A29
STRING: The night sky, huh?

LABEL: 0x7A41
STRING: Come to think of it, I hadn't seen the real sky in days.

LABEL: 0x7A7B
STRING: The blue sky I'd seen on the observation deck before diving had been clear and summer-like, but...

LABEL: 0x7ABF
STRING: That was like a distant memory now.

LABEL: 0x7AEF
STRING: 「It'll be okay... right?」

LABEL: 0x7B20
STRING: 「Feeling anxious?」

LABEL: 0x7B3F
STRING: Reiri bit back at the weak voice I let out.

LABEL: 0x7B82
STRING: 「Why do you think the story of the Mary Celeste has been passed down until now?」

LABEL: 0x7BD3
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x7BFC
STRING: 「The answer's simple. Because it's a tragic story.」

LABEL: 0x7C2E
STRING: 「The Toya Maru accident, the sinking of the Titanic...」

LABEL: 0x7C68
STRING: 「They're all attracting people because they're tragic stories.」

LABEL: 0x7CB4
STRING: 「――Struggling in futility and perishing.」

LABEL: 0x7CF0
STRING: 「Stories like that are popular with everyone.」

LABEL: 0x7D31
STRING: 「Reiri-san, stop thinking about the worst-case scenarios.」

LABEL: 0x7D69
STRING: 「Besides, according to my calculations...」

LABEL: 0x7D93
STRING: 「This plan will succeed.」

LABEL: 0x7DCA
STRING: 「I told you, I'm just kidding...」

LABEL: 0x7E07
STRING: Reiri looked annoyed after being scolded by Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x7E52
STRING: 「Let me revise one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x7ED9
STRING: 「This plan will succeed "according to my calculations" as well.」

LABEL: 0x7F14
STRING: Saying that, she took out her PDA.

LABEL: 0x7F43
STRING: A four-digit input screen appeared on it.

LABEL: 0x7F6C
STRING: That was the remote detonator switch.

LABEL: 0x7FAF
STRING: 「Katagiri――」

LABEL: 0x7FC9
STRING: 「I'll leave the timing to you.」

LABEL: 0x7FFA
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0x8010
STRING: I took a deep breath and exhaled.

LABEL: 0x8036
STRING: In the past few days――

LABEL: 0x8058
STRING: A lot had happened within the confines of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x8104
STRING: At times we hated each other, fought with each other, and despaired,

LABEL: 0x8138
STRING: but now that it was over, it seemed that all of it was a necessary process.

LABEL: 0x81E1
STRING: Whether we succeeded or failed, I had no regrets.

LABEL: 0x8223
STRING: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried―but my mind was clear.

LABEL: 0x82CA
STRING: Right, what should I do once I was saved?

LABEL: 0x82FA
STRING: My life on the surface flashed before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x8336
STRING: Scenes filled with nostalgia... But before returning to my normal life, there were things that had to be done.

LABEL: 0x83F9
STRING: The first was to atone for this sin.

LABEL: 0x8425
STRING: Tokiwa had said that no one was guilty, but that was only true within this limited space.

LABEL: 0x847D
STRING: If I returned to earthly society, I would be a criminal who had broken the law.

LABEL: 0x84B9
STRING: I'd have to pay for my crimes for social order to be maintained.

LABEL: 0x84F9
STRING: And, the other thing was...

LABEL: 0x8587
STRING: 「Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x85A3
STRING: I had been told that she was long dead.

LABEL: 0x85CF
STRING: But now, there was a possibility that she was alive.

LABEL: 0x85F7
STRING: I would go to her.

LABEL: 0x868A
STRING: 「Everyone ready?」

LABEL: 0x86B2
STRING: 「――Let's go!」

LABEL: 0x872D
STRING: I pressed the switch.

LABEL: 0x892C
STRING: Almost simultaneously...

LABEL: 0x8950
STRING: There was a terrible roar, and a vibration hit us.

LABEL: 0x897C
STRING: 「Whoa...」

LABEL: 0x89ED
STRING: My body floated up and slammed into the seat again.

LABEL: 0x8A27
STRING: If my body hadn't been fixed in place, that blow might have done me in.

LABEL: 0x8A75
STRING: ――Was everyone all right?

LABEL: 0x8A97
STRING: I tried calling out to check, but I was in no condition to open my mouth.

LABEL: 0x8AEF
STRING: No matter how hard I tried, all I could do was pray.

LABEL: 0x8BA2
STRING: For the grace of God――

LABEL: 0x8BC0
STRING: There was a loud pop.

LABEL: 0x8BF8
STRING: A rumbling sound followed soon after.

LABEL: 0x8C36
STRING: Following the initial impact, the ongoing tremors gradually lessened...

LABEL: 0x8C78
STRING: Eventually――

LABEL: 0x8CA8
STRING: Before I knew it, the tremors had subsided.

LABEL: 0x8CD4
STRING: I raised my head and stared straight ahead.

LABEL: 0x8D5F
STRING: The false starry sky was still there.

LABEL: 0x8D95
STRING: Nothing had changed... Did we fail?

LABEL: 0x8DC3
STRING: Did the bridge not break?

LABEL: 0x8DEF
STRING: 「Is everyone all right...?」

LABEL: 0x8E15
STRING: ――In an instant.

LABEL: 0x8E2D
STRING: My sitting body felt like it was accelerating.

LABEL: 0x8E5D
STRING: It was like riding an elevator with the sensation of your body lifting up, space and all.

LABEL: 0x8EC2
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III>... is floating...」

LABEL: 0x8F00
STRING: 「Does this mean everything went smoothly?」

LABEL: 0x8F3B
STRING: 「『Mamma Mia!』」

LABEL: 0x8F62
STRING: Cheerful voices.

LABEL: 0x8F7E
STRING: It... wasn't a failure!

LABEL: 0x8FAA
STRING: It was a success!

LABEL: 0x8FCF
STRING: 「We did it, Katagiri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x8FF8
STRING: 「Y-Yeah!」

LABEL: 0x9012
STRING: It was only for a moment that we were able to have a leisurely conversation.

LABEL: 0x904E
STRING: A moment later, my legs wobbled, and then――

LABEL: 0x9084
STRING: In the blink of an eye, my sense of balance was overturned.

LABEL: 0x913B
STRING: Were we... spinning?

LABEL: 0x915F
STRING: I desperately clung to the railing.

LABEL: 0x9187
STRING: My body, which should have been thrown about a long time ago, was supported by the fixtures tied to the seat.

LABEL: 0x91D7
STRING: The rotation wasn't in a fixed direction.

LABEL: 0x92BD
STRING: Back and forth, left and right, in circles...

LABEL: 0x92E1
STRING: We were shaken from every possible direction.

LABEL: 0x93CD
STRING: Where was the sky,

LABEL: 0x93E5
STRING: and where was the Earth, I didn't know anymore.

LABEL: 0x940D
STRING: All I knew was...

LABEL: 0x9427
STRING: We were heading toward the surface for certain.

LABEL: 0x94BC
STRING: I closed my eyes, unable to keep up with my shaky vision.

LABEL: 0x94F0
STRING: In the darkness,

LABEL: 0x9508
STRING: semi-circular canals were stirring.

LABEL: 0x952A
STRING: The confusing sensation didn't subside, leaving no time for nausea to set in.

LABEL: 0x957A
STRING: Freed from gravity,

LABEL: 0x959A
STRING: turning into bubbles,

LABEL: 0x95BA
STRING: getting caught by a big surge,

LABEL: 0x95E2
STRING: rising...

LABEL: 0x95F8
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x9612
STRING: My pendant slipped out of my pocket.

LABEL: 0x96D5
STRING: I opened my eyes and followed it.

LABEL: 0x96F3
STRING: The warped coin flew through the air.

LABEL: 0x9719
STRING: ――"DEI GRATIA" was not written on it.

LABEL: 0x9743
STRING: I was only able to track the coin for a moment.

LABEL: 0x97D7
STRING: I lost sight of it in an instant.

LABEL: 0x97F3
STRING: My vision became unfocused again.

LABEL: 0x981F
STRING: Flowing like a storm,

LABEL: 0x9841
STRING: I could hear intermittent sounds in the distance.

LABEL: 0x986D
STRING: Was that... a voice?

LABEL: 0x9889
STRING: Was that a dolphin,

LABEL: 0x98A1
STRING: a whale,

LABEL: 0x98B9
STRING: or...

LABEL: 0x98D3
STRING: I closed my eyes again.

LABEL: 0x98F9
STRING: ――And just like that, I lost consciousness.
